description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.7m in depth, maximum height of 3.7m and eaves height of 2.9m)
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of a single storey rear extension (4.7m in depth, maximum height of 3.7m and eaves height of 2.9m) would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. Therefore, in conflict with paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the materials used for the proposed extension would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse. In conflict with paragraph A.3 (a) under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
